resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: [Packaging][RPM] Fix conflict with arrow-libs and arrow8-libs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request, #13472:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13472

   /usr/share/doc/arrow/* are conflicted. We should put them into
   arrowX-libs.
   
   %doc -> %doc/%license changes aren't required for this fix but it's
   better that we mark LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt as license related
   files.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #13472:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13472#issuecomment-1170793084

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

fields.description: {{/usr/share/doc/arrow/*}} such as {{/usr/share/doc/arrow/README.md}} are conflicted. We should not use {{%doc}}?
fields.summary: [Packaging][RPM] Fix conflict with arrow-libs and arrow8-libs
